code: import React from"react";import axios from"axios";import StripeCheckout from"react-stripe-checkout";var StripeCheckoutButton=function StripeCheckoutButton(_ref){var price=_ref.price;var priceForStripe=price*100;var publishableKey="pk_test_WsPPMk6sEBYfOcXaGXug0Jum00Q1gOzuQY";var onToken=function onToken(token){axios({url:"payment",method:"post",data:{amount:priceForStripe,token:token}}).then(function(response){alert("payment was successful");}).catch(function(error){console.log("payment error",error);alert("there was an issue with payment");});};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(StripeCheckout,{label:"Pay now",name:"MAv CLothing",billingAddress:true,shippingAddress:true,image:true,description:"Your total is $".concat(price),amount:priceForStripe,panelLabel:"Pay now",token:onToken,stripeKey:publishableKey});};export default StripeCheckoutButton;
